description: Create an App Runner VPC Ingress Connection resource. App Runner requires this resource when you want to associate your App Runner service with an Amazon VPC endpoint.

parameters.name: ServiceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for this App Runner service that is used to create the VPC Ingress Connection resource.

parameters.name: VpcIngressConnectionName
parameters.description: A name for the VPC Ingress Connection resource. It must be unique across all the active VPC Ingress Connections in your Amazon Web Services account in the Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: IngressVpcConfiguration
parameters.description: Specifications for the customer's Amazon VPC and the related Amazon Web Services PrivateLink VPC endpoint that are used to create the VPC Ingress Connection resource. VpcId (string) --- The ID of the VPC that is used for the VPC endpoint. VpcEndpointId (string) --- The ID of the VPC endpoint that your App Runner service connects to.

nested_params.name: VpcId
nested_params.description: The ID of the VPC that is used for the VPC endpoint.

nested_params.name: VpcEndpointId
nested_params.description: The ID of the VPC endpoint that your App Runner service connects to.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: An optional list of metadata items that you can associate with the VPC Ingress Connection resource. A tag is a key-value pair. (dict) --- Describes a tag that is applied to an App Runner resource. A tag is a metadata item consisting of a key-value pair. Key (string) --- The key of the tag. Value (string) --- The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: VpcIngressConnection
nested_items.description: A description of the App Runner VPC Ingress Connection resource that's created by this request.

nested_items.name: VpcIngressConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPC Ingress Connection.

nested_items.name: VpcIngressConnectionName
nested_items.description: The customer-provided VPC Ingress Connection name.

nested_items.name: ServiceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service associated with the VPC Ingress Connection.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the VPC Ingress Connection. The VPC Ingress Connection displays one of the following statuses: AVAILABLE, PENDING_CREATION, PENDING_UPDATE, PENDING_DELETION, FAILED_CREATION, FAILED_UPDATE, FAILED_DELETION, and DELETED..

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The Account Id you use to create the VPC Ingress Connection resource.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The domain name associated with the VPC Ingress Connection resource.

nested_items.name: IngressVpcConfiguration
nested_items.description: Specifications for the customer's VPC and related PrivateLink VPC endpoint that are used to associate with the VPC Ingress Connection resource.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC that is used for the VPC endpoint.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC endpoint that your App Runner service connects to.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the VPC Ingress Connection was created. It's in the Unix time stamp format.

nested_items.name: DeletedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the App Runner service was deleted. It's in the Unix time stamp format.
